name: Chew Shoe
description: Vigorously gnawing on a shoe until it’s thoroughly destroyed.

name: Bite Ankle
description: A quick, low-to-the-ground nip to slow down or frustrate someone.

name: Fetch Stick
description: Racing off to retrieve a thrown stick and returning it with precision.

name: Poop In House
description: Strategically leaving a messy surprise indoors, often out of spite or confusion.

name: Bark At Shadow
description: Mistaking shadows for threats and alerting the pack with loud barks.

name: Bark At Neighbour
description: Alerting everyone by loudly announcing the presence of the neighbor.

name: Jump The Fence
description: Leaping gracefully over the backyard barrier in pursuit of adventure.

name: Roll Over
description: A classic obedience trick: flipping onto the back and completing a full roll.

name: Play Dead
description: Feigning lifelessness to confuse or amuse onlookers.

name: Sit
description: Assuming a seated position on command, a basic obedience skill.

name: Stay
description: Remaining perfectly still, no matter the distractions.

name: Steal Bagel
description: Silently snatching a bagel off the counter before anyone notices.

name: Eat Iphone Charger
description: Chewing through a phone charger cable with determined jaw power.

name: Unroll Toilet Paper
description: Methodically pawing at the toilet paper roll until it’s strewn all over.

name: Dig Up Garden
description: Clawing and snouting through flower beds to create chaotic craters.

name: Scatter Laundry
description: Grabbing clothes from the laundry basket and distributing them around the house.

name: Steal Remote
description: Sneaking onto the couch and quietly making off with the TV remote.

name: Shred Couch Cushion
description: Ripping into sofa cushions and turning them into fluffy confetti.

name: Knock Over Trash Can
description: Toppling the garbage can to rummage through its delightful contents.

name: Howl At 2 Am
description: A calculated nighttime performance to rouse the entire household.
